[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genkit-ai/ai](./ai.md)

## ai package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Candidate](./ai.candidate.md)


</td><td>

Candidate represents one of several possible generated responses from a generation request. A candidate contains a single generated message along with additional metadata about its generation. A generation request can create multiple candidates.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[GenerateResponse](./ai.generateresponse.md)


</td><td>

GenerateResponse is the result from a `generate()` call and contains one or more generated candidate messages.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Message](./ai.message.md)


</td><td>

Message represents a single role's contribution to a generation. Each message can contain multiple parts (for example text and an image), and each generation can contain multiple messages.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

</td><td>

Helper method to configure a [EvaluatorReference](./ai.evaluatorreference.md) to a plugin.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[generate(options)](./ai.generate.md)


</td><td>

Generate calls a generative model based on the provided prompt and configuration. If `history` is provided, the generation will include a conversation history in its request. If `tools` are provided, the generate method will automatically resolve tool calls returned from the model unless `returnToolRequests` is set to `true`<!-- -->.

See `GenerateOptions` for detailed information about available options.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[generateStream(options)](./ai.generatestream.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[index(params)](./ai.index.md)


</td><td>

Indexes documents using a [IndexerAction](./ai.indexeraction.md) or a .


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[indexerRef(options)](./ai.indexerref.md)


</td><td>

Helper method to configure a [IndexerReference](./ai.indexerreference.md) to a plugin.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[renderPrompt(params)](./ai.renderprompt.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[retrieve(params)](./ai.retrieve.md)


</td><td>

Retrieves documents from a [RetrieverAction](./ai.retrieveraction.md) based on the provided query.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[retrieverRef(options)](./ai.retrieverref.md)


</td><td>
